# Intron cluster level analysis



::: {.cell hash='2024-06-01-unprod-splice-intron-features.pub_cache/html/get counts_3b045f835c8d448741ba76f21f8c5d17'}

```{.r .cell-code}
proj_path <- "/project/yangili1/cdai/SpliFi"
counts.f <- "code/results/pheno/noisy/Geuvadis/EUR/leafcutter_perind_numers.counts.noise_by_intron.gz"
counts.f <- glue("{proj_path}/{counts.f}")

counts <- fread(counts.f)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='2024-06-01-unprod-splice-intron-features.pub_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_38c051a673295eea0bdbed15cae6ce1b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
counts[1:5,1:5] 

dim(counts)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='2024-06-01-unprod-splice-intron-features.pub_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_c342a7dcfafbb5c6451f68038fc9a9ea'}

```{.r .cell-code}
counts[, .(HG00096)] %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = HG00096)) + 
  geom_histogram(bins = 100)
```
:::
